welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Richfield, where small-town charm meets big-city adventure. Get ready to discover the natural beauty, rich history, and delicious cuisine that our city is known for. Enjoy your stay and soak up all that Richfield has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal of Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, mainly serving low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Flying Cloud Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Flying Cloud Airport caters to executive and private flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, duty-free shopping, and currency exchange services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Downtown Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing exclusive lounges and services for discerning travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Crystal Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Crystal Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Anoka County-Blaine Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Anoka County-Blaine Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
